messages: 37f31694ce2528a64cfacc73c612ef06 (04:30): anyone here uses dreamweaver, and know how to add an extension
37f31694ce2528a64cfacc73c612ef06 (04:30): like I want to add .inc extension and have it treat like a .php extension
37f31694ce2528a64cfacc73c612ef06 (04:30): anyone know how to do that
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:41): anybody home?
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:45): i'm pulling my hair out, when ever the right scroll bar appears on the lower frame of this page a bottom scrollbar appears to!
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:45): http://www.successthroughresults.com
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:45): anybody help lol please!
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (04:46): that's funny, I get no scrolling at all
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:46): well it's only in internet explore
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:46): goto the contact page
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:47): if your resolution is high enough it won't scroll at all
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:47): the funny thing is if you view the contact page outside the frame there is no problem at all.
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:48): it seems to be the frames page itself thats making the bottom scrollbar appear
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (04:48): <frame src="main_index.html" name="mainFrame" id="mainFrame" title="mainFrame" scrolling="auto" />
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:49): i added scrolling=auto to try an solve the problem
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:49): no dice
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (04:49): is fine in Opera too
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:49): yes and also in firefox
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:49): but not IE
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (04:50): well, the scrolling is there, since it has not enough space for the widest element in the frame
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (04:50): now, the widest may not be a visible element, it may just be padding or margin
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (04:50): I'd roughly think is user agent defauts
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:50): interesting
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (04:50): `zip @ ezgranny420

c95720c193df40ce1618d1b00b040b42 (04:50): ezgranny420, zip: Start every stylesheet with this: * { margin: 0; padding: 0; }. You'll save yourself the confusion over quite a few strange element and browser spacing differences later on.
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:50): if you look at the source i have the margins set to zero
8f12e8acf6f40c6047f6fdc6ff6dba06 (04:51): aah thank you for the suggestions

4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (04:53): hello.. please, does anybody know about flash based discussion board(forum)? I mean, I dont want to talk there about flash, but I want my flash based site to contain forum.
4b1bee0e40377c8094df2adb4ae9c6e5 (04:53): what kind of site do you have?
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (04:54): happydude, well, the site is not yet build
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (04:55): I develop Pocket PC software, and study flash for my site
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (04:55): I want to have forum there, but I dont want to jump from flash to html
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (04:55): the site will be pure flash one
4b1bee0e40377c8094df2adb4ae9c6e5 (04:57): so your site is going to have limited accessibility
4b1bee0e40377c8094df2adb4ae9c6e5 (04:57): do you think everyone has flash?
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (04:57): based on what I have read, 95% of people have flash installed
4b1bee0e40377c8094df2adb4ae9c6e5 (04:57): or wants flash?
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (04:58): yeah the site is going to be for game development... I would say it is acceptable to use well optimized flash site
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (04:58): and there might be html option too, but primarily, i wisth to have flash site
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (04:59): that's some stat
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (04:59): flash doesn't install as standard default on most browsers, only browser I know of that installs Flash plugin right off the box is Opera in win32 only
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (04:59): yeah, last week I read Building Flash Sites for Dummies - an easy and fast introducition to Flash, and that book mentioned those 95%
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (05:00): ah I thought, flas is built into Microsoft's IE
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (05:00): I'd go as high as ... maybe 80%, not 95%
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (05:01): but a flash forum I'd think will be slow and as happydude said, not so accessible
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (05:01): yeah, maybe.. however, I am so amazed by flash, taht I wish to have my site in flash.. later I might to implement html too..
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (05:02): hehe
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (05:02): yeah, I understant what you mean, CommandPrompt. I hoped I can optimize the site well
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (05:02): sorry, I am not very experienced in this area, although I am well experienced in 3d and C++
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (05:02): IMO you're going in the wrong direction, html goes first, then you add flash in the markup to spice up
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (05:03): or I can create pure flash site
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (05:03): that's like saying, I'm amazed by PDF, I wish my site was one whole .pdf file
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (05:03): there is nice Swift3D that adds 3D to the site.. I would like tohave it..
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (05:04): BunkaiSK:  flash is like pepper, you use a dash on html, it works smoking nice, you put too much, you spoil everything
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (05:05): ah, I see.. indeed, take a look at this, and tell me please, if you like it: http://www.moxiedisplays.com/auto_intro.html
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (05:05): it is pure flas site
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (05:06): well
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (05:06): that will work if I had flash installed and enabled here :P
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (05:06): which I don't
4b47749ae508972ccd6d01a108bbbdb0 (05:06): ah I see.. :-) you literally don't like Flash.. :-)
